title: Epoch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- When aligned with the evil team, select a player at night. If another evil player selects them that night, attack them.
- When aligned with the good team,  grant two players powerful defense for the night
- At night, change your alignment to win with the good team. You may only do this once and only if you’ve killed at least 1 good player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When you change your alignment, you will be roleblocked through immunities for the next 2 nights.
